title: Cities with the most parkland per 1,000 residents in the U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing City, and Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents in each City on the y axis.
The Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents is appeared to be the highest at City Anchorage and lowest at City Phoenix.
There is a difference of 2982.1 between the maximum City Anchorage and minimum City Phoenix.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents for 15 number of Citys.
City Anchorage has the highest Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents and Phoenix has the lowest Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents.
The lowest value at City Phoenix is 98.14x times less than the highest value at Anchorage.
Acres of parkland per 1,000 residents at City Anchorage is 3012.8 , second place is  at 3012.8, and thirdly is Scottsdale at 126.4.
